derivation.yuyuan_name: 1940s (denoting a huge aerial bomb): from block + buster

entry.tran: 轰动一时的电影；一度热卖的畅销书
entry.def: A blockbuster is a film or book that is very popular and successful, usually because it is very exciting.

means.word_mean: 1. a large bomb used to demolish extensive areas (as a city block)
2. an unsually successful hit with widespread popularity and huge sales (especially a movie or play or recording or novel)
